name: PDFReporter
tagline: The library is a fork of the popular open source Jasper Reports and supports the common features provided by Jasper Reports, but offline and for mobile apps. The PDFReporter library supports iOS, Java and Android library. For your document and report design you use the PDFReporter Studio where you can visualize your data.
body:
### Welcome to PDFReporter.
Generating documents and reports, offline enabled and reliable. Design your own reports and documents for your mobile business need while using the PDFReporter Studio.


### Licensing
Generally you can use the library as long as your app is open source and published on one of the common repositories on the web. The library is a multi project and supports the following licenses, Apache License V2.0, GNU General Public License version 3.0 (GPLv3), GNU Library or Lesser General Public License version 3.0 (LGPLv3)

If want to use it commercially please contact sales@pdfreporting.com for further informations. 
The official webpage from [PDFReporter](http://www.pdfreporting.com).

### Get started
You will find samples, pdf files and instructions on our expression language that is used in the document template engine at this [location](http://sourceforge.net/projects/pdfreporter/files/).

### Documents generated in the business by example
* Report from a customer visit.
* An offer from an insurance broker
* Client investment profile
* Account opening document with legal digital signing
* Delivery slip
* Defect report from a service man
* Contract builder in the banking industry
* Service quality report in the retail industry

### Support, milestones and discussions
Having trouble with the library or any question? Check out the [tickets](https://sourceforge.net/p/pdfreporter/tickets/) or the [discussions](https://sourceforge.net/p/pdfreporter/discussion/). Weâ€™ll help you as soon as we can.
